metadata.title: CVE-2018-11396 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ephy-session.c in libephymain.so in GNOME Web (aka Epiphany) through3.28.2.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (applicationcrash) via JavaScript code that triggers access to a NULL URL, asdemonstrated by a crafted window.open call.

criterions.comment: epiphany-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
